EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_7AM What's new in Spring Data.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Today's webinar: What's new in Spring Data
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Thank you for registering for today's webinar What's new in Spring Data on Tuesday, January 26, 2016.
Please see event details below:
Date: Tuesday, January 26, 2016 Time: 3:00PM GMT (London, GMT)
Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1120587/A79B2BF0E3C7913C882A4A10C3F1D2A8]]> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers.
We look forward to you joining us!
